events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated in days, and I'm very concerned about the shipping delay.
The reported problem is identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's message mentioning late shipment and tracking issues.
The case has been assigned to delivery support agent John D. for follow-up and resolution.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand your delivery is delayed and I am here to help resolve this issue for you.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can investigate the shipping status properly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the tracking number is ZX987654321. The last update was from 5 days ago showing shipment in transit.

I have contacted the courier service and they confirmed a delay due to weather conditions. We expect your package to arrive within 3 more days. We apologize for the inconvenience and can offer a shipping voucher for your next purchase.
Thank you for the update and for the voucher offer. I appreciate the quick response and will wait for the delivery as expected.
We consider the delivery delay issue resolved as the package has shipped and is now expected to arrive shortly. Please reach out if there are any further concerns.
We are checking in to ensure your delivery arrived and that you are satisfied with the resolution. Thank you for your patience during the delay.
As we have not heard further from you and your delivery is complete, we will now close this case. Thank you for being a valued customer.
